message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer is in your best interest, considering the inflation.
Alice, I think 50/50 is fair, but considering the inflation, I need a bit more. Let's meet in the middle... kind of.
Bob, time is running out for you. Accept this offer before inflation eats away at your potential gains even more.
Alice, you're right, time is running out for me. But I still think I can get a better deal than your last offer. Meet me at 55/45 and we have a deal.
